Title: R-Mag

----

Text: In 2014, L’atelier Irradié created a proposal for the design and naming of Raghunter’s new web magazine. The art direction is based on bold and dynamic scroll animations with a flexible and strict grid.

----

Date: 

----

Client: RAGHUNTER

----

Projecttype: Screen

----

Text2: The website as whole borrows to print magazines codes in the various contrasting  typesetting.

----

Year: 2014

----

Projecttype1: Screen

----

Projecttype2:
